pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Hello WorldA simple library that gives you randomized memes. This is useful for discord.py or anything else included with bots.For discord.py your code would look like this:## Installation```pip install pyrandmeme==0.0.5```# Usage```python from discord.ext import commandsfrom pyrandmeme import *client = commands.Bot(command_prefix="(Add prefix here)")@client.command()async def meme(ctx): await ctx.send(embed=await pyrandmeme())client.run(token)```
